job.title: Data science Engineer/ Data scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Our client is looking for Data science Engineer Data scientist is long term project in Multiple Locations below is the detailed requirements.  Job Title  Data science Engineer Data scientist  Location  Multiple Locations  Duration  Long term Bachelor's degree in Computer science or equivalent, with minimum 10+ Years of relevant experience.  Strong experience in Set up Data Science program  Must have experience in Set-up Data Science process  Should have prior experience in Manufacturing  Product Quality domain, specifically in DIAPharma.  You should Engage as a spot consultant on use cases.  Demonstrate excellent communication skills including the ability to effectively communicate with internal and external customers.  Ability to use strong industry knowledge to relate to customer needs and dissolve customer concerns and high level of focus and attention to detail.  Strong work ethic with good time management with ability to work with diverse teams and lead meetings.
